sys_script_include.description: Gets an existing record based on query values or inserts a new record into a table with the specified values if the record does not exist.
sys_script_include.name: RecordGetOrInsert

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_6fb7019d1b84c510edf3642aab4bcbbc
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_devtools.RecordGetOrInsert</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Gets an existing record based on query values or inserts a new record into a table with the specified values if the record does not exist.</description><name>RecordGetOrInsert</name><script><![CDATA[function RecordGetOrInsert(strTable,values)
{
	strTable = GetStringValue(strTable);
	if (IsValidTable(strTable) == false)
	{
		return false;
	}
	if (GetType(values) != 'Object')
	{
		return false;
	}
	var grRecord = new GlideRecord(strTable);
	grRecord.initialize();
	var aKeys = GetKeys(values);
	for (var nKey = 0; nKey < aKeys.length; nKey++)
	{
		var strKey = aKeys[nKey];
		if (IsValidColumn(strTable,strKey) == true)
		{
			grRecord.setValue(strKey,values[strKey]);
		}
	}
	var vResult = GlideRecordGetOrInsert(grRecord);
	if (IsValidSysId(vResult) == true)
	{
		return vResult;
	}
	return false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-24 22:08:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>6fb7019d1b84c510edf3642aab4bcbbc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RecordGetOrInsert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_devtools">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6fb7019d1b84c510edf3642aab4bcbbc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-24 22:08:55</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
